page.title: 08Burton Latimer - Shopping
page.content: The shops of the town were classified into the following types: Food & Drink 14 Services 10 Clothing & Footwear 2 Specialist 8 Household supplies 6 Catering 4 Department Stores 0 The numbers indicate the number of each type. We looked at other amenities in the town.At the Health Centre there are 4 doctors, & other staff include a treat- ment nurse,2 district nurses, a midwife & 2 health visitors.Details of surgery times could be obtained from the receptionist at the centre which is in the High Street, next to Pigotts Lane. On the same site is the town Library which opened in 1971.It contains 40 000 books & caters for all ages.
